constantValues: Unique identifier of the resource expansion record.
Item that is part of expansion of resource identified by object ID. One object ID can have many item IDs.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'methodCode_display' is added to the 'ResourceExpansion' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'methodCode'
arguments.name: methodCode_display

constantValues: Date and time when the record was last modified.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
